stability_log.description: Released version 11.0.0 Omni-Intelligence. Integrated Gemini 3.1 Pro and Gemini 3 Flash across all modules.
Upgraded all cognitive agents to Gemini 3.1 Pro and Gemini 3 Flash for enhanced reasoning and speed.
Implemented Audio Drift Correction & Batch Tool Response to fix 503 errors and latency.
